mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user( id, login_name, password, no, name, email, phone, mobile, user_type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, login_flag, photo, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{no}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, #{userType}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{loginFlag}, #{photo}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET login_name = #{loginName}, password = #{password}, no = #{no}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, mobile = #{mobile}, user_type = #{userType}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, login_flag = #{loginFlag}, photo = #{photo} WHERE id = #{id}
